title: Trousergate: Nicky Morgan pulls out of planned Have I Got News For You appearance | Leicester Mercury
text:
Comments (0) 
Loughborough MP Nicky Morgan has backed out of a planned appearance on Have I Got News For You just days after a row over her criticism of Theresa May's Â£1,000 leather trousers. 
The spat between Mrs Morgan and a senior aide to Prime Minister led to Mrs Morgan being uninvited to a meeting about Brexit in Downing Street 
It has emerged that Mrs Morgan has pulled out of Friday's episode of BBC One's hit satirical show due to "unforeseen circumstances". 
Producers had booked her in September to appear on the show, which is due to be hosted by Match of the Day presenter Gary Lineker. 
A spokesman for Hat Trick Productions declined to give a reason for Ms Morgan's decision. 
Mrs Morgan had criticised Mrs May's attire for a magazine photo-shoot by saying: "My barometer is always, 'How am I going to explain this in Loughborough market?' 
"I don't have leather trousers. I don't think I've ever spent that much on anything apart from my wedding dress." 
She has declined to comment further.
